articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Weather tracker: India and Pakistan keep close eye on tropical cyclone - The Guardian
articles.description: Biparjoy predicted to weaken but could bring torrential rain, high waves and strong winds. Elsewhere, South America feels a chill
articles.content: During the latter stages of last week, a tropical cyclonic circulation over the Arabian Sea intensified rapidly and was named Tropical Cyclone Biparjoy by Friday. The storm maintained a category 1 st… [+1887 chars]
